channel.description: p1 = input("Enter \"rock\", \"paper\", or \"scissors\" for player 1: ") p2 = input("Enter \"rock\", \"paper\", or \"scissors\" for player 2: ") if p1 == "rock": if p2 == "rock": print("tie") elif p2 == "paper": print("player 2 wins") elif p2 == "scissors": print("player 1 wins") else: print("error") elif p1 == "paper": if p2 == "rock": print("player 1 wins") elif p2 == "paper": print("tie") elif p2 == "scissors": print("player 2 wins"
